title: It takes a score better than 17/0/5 on Garen to get an S rank.
body:
My friend is _really_ good with {{champion:86}} and wanted to get a couple tokens so he can unlock level 6 for him.

Needless to say he was super pissed with a score like 17 / 0 / 5 only got him a miserly **A**, while I fed my arse with my crummy 8/8/15 support {{champion:202}} and got an **S** rank.

We don't know exactly how bad these derpy support Jhins are, and we certainly have no clue how good these wild Garens are.
